SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::TwoDimBool

SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::TwoDimBool Class Reference

Array of 2*DIM booleans (with default constructor), used to instantiate the sparse container map<LocalId,TwoDimBool> (map<LocalId,bool[2*DIM]> does not work). More...

#include <source/SAMRAI/hier/PatchGeometry.h>

const tbox::Dimension & getDim () const

Detailed Description

Array of 2*DIM booleans (with default constructor), used to instantiate the sparse container map<LocalId,TwoDimBool> (map<LocalId,bool[2*DIM]> does not work).
